column5: Just a heads up for the Mtl guys and anyone else(lots of guys from Ontario are going to be there) thats interested, there will be a Fishing Gear Swap this Sunday March 4 between 10 am and 2 pm at the St. Louis Fishing and Hunting Club (3051 St. Joseph Lachine). Going to be some great deals on rods ,reels,baits and lots of other fishing related items. All are welcome,hope to see some of you guys there.
I will be there .See you there
I,m leaving now,.............I heard we have guys from Ottawa,Winchester and even Belleville coming down. Its going to be a great event.

It was a great event I bought  some good Quality fishing Tackle.  Sure was a pleasure to meet up with many familiar fishing folks.Sort of a relief as the winter is starting to come to an end.  Curious to try out the new Umbrella rigs.  Also a Pleasure to meet you finally Larry.  Until next year.
Great I wanted to go, but the wife suggested that i had spent enough at the Fishing Show this year I told her it was to meet anglers too, but she knows me really, really well
Nice meeting you,Mike.....now your all set for the upcoming fishing year.
